title: Checkout button disabled on iOS 17
text: Steps: Open cart -> tap Checkout. Actual: button stays disabled. Expected: proceed to checkout. iOS 17 only. Workaround: restart app.

title: Login fails with "Invalid token" after app relaunch
text: Steps: Login -> kill app -> reopen. Actual: user logged out and cannot login (invalid token). Expected: refresh token and login works. Notes: token refresh endpoint returns 401 intermittently.

title: Address list empty after adding a new address
text: Steps: Profile -> Addresses -> Add new. Actual: list becomes empty until app restart. Expected: new address appears immediately. Observed on Android 14.

title: Search results show duplicates after applying filters
text: Steps: Search "pizza" -> apply price filter. Actual: duplicates appear and scrolling repeats items. Expected: unique items. Impact: confusing but order possible.

title: Apple Pay payment succeeds but order stuck in pending
text: Steps: Checkout with Apple Pay. Actual: payment success but order remains Pending for 10+ minutes. Expected: order confirmed. Notes: gateway returns success; backend order status not updated.

title: Cart total mismatches after removing item quickly
text: Steps: Add 3 items -> remove 1 quickly -> total shows old value. Expected: totals update. Temporary fix: reopen cart screen.

title: Tracking map freezes on first load
text: Steps: Open order tracking. Actual: map loads then freezes; driver marker not updating. Expected: live updates. More frequent on poor network.

title: Push notifications delayed by 10+ minutes
text: Steps: Place order -> wait for driver assigned. Actual: push arrives late; in-app status updates fine. Expected: timely push. Root cause suspected: APNs token refresh.

title: Refund status not updated after cancellation
text: Steps: Cancel paid order -> open order details. Actual: refund shows "Processing" for days; backend says completed. Expected: status updated. Customer complaints increasing.

title: Promo code applies but discount not reflected in total
text: Steps: Apply promo -> go to payment. Actual: discount shown in line items but final total unchanged. Expected: total reduced. Happens with stacked fees.

title: Home feed loads blank on cold start
text: Steps: Cold start app. Actual: blank screen 3-5s then content appears or stays blank. Expected: skeleton then content. Possibly API timeout not handled.

title: Vendor menu missing items until refresh
text: Steps: Open vendor -> scroll menu. Actual: some categories empty until pull-to-refresh. Expected: items show immediately. Cache invalidation issue.

title: Order history shows wrong timestamps (timezone issue)
text: Steps: View past orders. Actual: timestamps shifted by +3 hours. Expected: local timezone. Backend returns UTC

title: App crashes when opening saved cards screen
text: Steps: Profile -> Payment methods. Actual: crash. Expected: list cards. Stacktrace: null pointer on card brand icon mapping.

title: OTP SMS not received for some carriers
text: Steps: Login -> request OTP. Actual: OTP never arrives for certain carriers. Expected: SMS in <30s. Retry doesnâ€™t help. Impact: user blocked from login.

title: Rating screen appears twice after delivery complete
text: Steps: Complete delivery -> rating pops -> dismiss -> pops again. Expected: once. Minor annoyance.

title: Dark mode makes checkout text unreadable
text: Steps: Enable dark mode -> checkout screen. Actual: grey text on dark grey background for fee breakdown. Expected: accessible contrast.

title: Add address pin drops in wrong location
text: Steps: Add address -> drag pin. Actual: pin snaps ~200m away. Expected: accurate. More common when GPS weak; map provider rounding issue.

title: Restaurant ETA not updated after driver reassigned
text: Steps: Driver reassigned mid-order. Actual: ETA stays old; tracking shows new driver. Expected: ETA recalculated. Backend ETA event missing.

title: Deep link to order tracking sometimes opens home
text: Steps: Open tracking deep link from push. Actual: lands on Home. Expected: open tracking. Occurs if app was killed and user not fully hydrated.
